(Mestercipo CPU hátlap)
(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1.5 h19
t2 m d3 h19

yxz
safe-100,10,15
xm
ym

t1
s50
f350

t2

(router nulla)
#h 0,0 d3 z1 c0.05
#h 268,0 d3 z1 c0.05

(nagyolás)
t2

offset21.5,7

c2 = 0.5
z2 = 3.5
print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

(antenna)
h 4.5,19 d7 z$z2 c$c2
h 241.8,19 d7 z$z2 c$c2

(táp)
h 219.8,19 d9.5 z$z2 c$c2

(ledsor)
x1 = 9
y1 = 4
y2 = add($y1,6.5)

print "x1=$x1"
print "y1=$y1"
print "y2=$y2"

h $x1,$y1 d3 z$z2 c$c2
h $x1,$y2 d3

x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3

x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
h $x1,$y2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
h $x1,$y2 d3

(reset)
x1 = add($x1,9)
h $x1,$y2 d3.5

(furatok)


(ethernet wan)
b inline 85.65,10.9 size16.1,16.6 z$z2 c$c2 g1,0.5,0.7

(ethernet lan)
b inline 106.45,11.9 size69.7,15.8 z$z2 f350 c$c2 g1,0.5,0.7

offset0,10

(hdmi)

b inline 203.5,11 size19,9 z$z2 c$c2 f200 g1,0.5,0.7

(hűtő - furatok)
x1 = 203.5
y1 = 24
y2 = add($y1,5.55)

hx1 = add($x1,1.915)
hy1 = add($y1,2.08)
hy2 = add($y2,2.08)

h $hx1,$hy1 d3 z$z2 c$c2
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)c1 = 1
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
#h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
#h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)

(simítás)

t1

offset21.5,7

c1 = 1
print "c1=$c1"

f200

(ethernet wan)
b inline 85.65,10.9 size16.1,16.6 z2.9 c$c1 g1,1,0.7 jg0.1

(ethernet lan)
b inline 106.45,11.9 size69.7,15.8 z2.9 c$c1 g1,1,0.7 jg0.1

c1 = 0.1

(hdmi)
offset0,10
b inline 203.5,11 size19,9 z2.9 c$c1 g1,1,0.7 jg1

(hűtő - rács)
x1 = 203.5
y1 = 24
y2 = add($y1,5.55)

hx1 = add($x1,1.915)
hy1 = add($y1,2.08)
hy2 = add($y2,2.08)

b inline $x1,$y1 size3.83,4.16 z2.9 c$c1
b inline $x1,$y2 size3.83,4.16 z2.9 cc$c1
x1 = add($x1,5.2)
hx1 = add($hx1,5.2)
b inline $x1,$y1 size3.83,4.16
b inline $x1,$y2 size3.83,4.16
x1 = add($x1,5.2)

b inline $x1,$y2 size3.83,4.16

b inline $x1,$y2 size3.83,4.16

b inline $x1,$y2 size3.83,4.16
